title: Moen Two-Handle Roman Tub Adjustable Valve with Shower Diverter, 1/2-Inch CPVC PEX Connection, 9793

description: Easily change out the trim kits of your Roman tub with the Moen Roman Tub Adjustable Valve. This valve is built on Moen M-PACT technology and is compatible with Moen widespread trim kits that have been designed for the M-PACT valve system. Once in place, the valve makes it possible to swap out different styles of decorative trim without ever touching the plumbing of your Roman tub. Choose from a variety of timeless faucet styles for quick and easy updates to your interior, anytime. Durable metal construction makes this valve a reliable addition to your plumbing system. From the Manufacturer From finishes that are guaranteed to last a lifetime, to faucets that perfectly balance your water pressure, Moen sets the standard for exceptional beauty and reliable, innovative design.
